name: In the whale's belly, I sat, cried and got out
name_original: In the whale's belly, I sat, cried and got out
description:
Well, it’s kinda done. My first solo game jam which was actually playable. 

You play as a little fella trapped inside a whale who’s also trying to get out by making a pile out of trash. Oh, the trash pieces have to be placed next to another surface.

Controls: 

WASD - Directionals to walk 

Mouse to look around and grab objects 

 P to pause menu

E to enter Edit Mode

Inside Edit Mode: 

G to translate 

R to rotate 

And you can lock axis with X, Y and Z
